programme.desc: Eight Misbehavin': Apu and Manjula take fertility drugs to get pregnant and end up with octuplets. Local companies shower them with gifts, until the Shelbyville Nine are born.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: How the Test Was Won: When Bart gets top marks in a test, Lisa's so shocked that she freezes in her exam. Homer desperately avoids danger after failing to renew his insurance.

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off...
programme.desc: ...for Stand Up To Cancer: Emma Willis, Clara Amfo, Blake Harrison and Alex Horne make biscuits, madeleines and choux pastry sculptures embodying their secret talent.

programme.title: Big Fat Quiz: Best Bits
programme.desc: From James Corden and Sean Lock to Rose Matafeo and Jonathan Ross, this special episode looks back on 20 years of Big Fat Quizzing with Jimmy Carr and some dazzling dream-team duos. (Ep1/4)

programme.title: New: Dating Naked UK
programme.desc: Brand new series - Kiss Kiss: Jono and Tiegen go on a messy artistic date, and Jono gets his hose out to wash Tiegen down. One pair are pushed to breaking point.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Self-confessed 'dating disaster' Katie from Bristol wants to turn her luck around. Student James has a thing for heels and glitter, and hopes to meet an open-minded guy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Locomotive Manipulation: Love is in the air when Amy convinces Sheldon to join her for a romantic train trip to Napa Valley to celebrate Valentine's Day.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Table Polarization: Leonard buys a dining table for the flat but Sheldon objects to such a big change inside his home. Meanwhile, Howard gets the chance to return to space.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers watch Coronation Street, Educating Yorkshire, The Great British Bake Off, The Inheritance, Stranded on Honeymoon Island, The Guest and The Dog House.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Great Money Caper: When Homer leaves Bart by the squid port, kind strangers start giving money to the 'street urchin'. So Homer and Bart turn to a life of scamming.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: How I Wet Your Mother: Homer develops a bedwetting habit, so the family infiltrate his dreams and search for clues in his subconscious to find the source of his problem.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Clown in the Dumps: Krusty loses confidence and retires from showbusiness after his father dies. Lisa frets about Homer's health.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Albert Einstein and the Story of Another Mary: Thinking that she may be expecting, Mary secretly buys a pregnancy test with Meemaw. Sheldon takes up the violin.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Perfect Score and a Bunsen Burner Marshmallow: Sheldon moves in with Dr Sturgis for a night to see what it would be like to leave home and go to college.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Snapped: Claire needs to clear the house before anyone makes her look bad in front of a reporter from an important women's business magazine. Jay invites Manny to a wine tasting.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Big Baby Ball: When Coach Mellor singles out Adam during dodgeball, Beverly intervenes and gets him fired. But then Murray and Adam see Mellor in a new light.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Goldberg Thanksgiving: Beverly challenges Erica to participate in Jazzercise after Erica says her mum's obsession is sad. Marvin visits the family at Thanksgiving.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Locomotive Manipulation: Love is in the air when Amy convinces Sheldon to join her for a romantic train trip to Napa Valley to celebrate Valentine's Day.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Two-Timing Goldbergs: Love and loyalty win when Lainey comes home, and Adam and Carmen come to a crossroads in their relationship.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Crush: Beverly struggles with her feelings for a new crush, while Barry leases his own apartment without considering Joanne.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Better Annie: Adam's excited about introducing Carmen to his family, until he's shocked by a former incident between her and one of his siblings.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Flyer's Path to Victory: When the Flyers make it to the Stanley Cup finals, Barry implements superstitious protocols that the family must follow.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Handlebar: Gordon Ramsay takes on a time warp at the Handlebar restaurant and lounge in Mount Sinai, New York, where the owners are stuck in the 80s with an unenthusiastic chef.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Sabatiello's: Gordon Ramsay sets his sights on Sabatiello's, an Italian restaurant in Connecticut that's better known for its owner Sammy's tantrums than the food.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Trobiano's: Gordon Ramsay meets struggling executive chef Anthony Trobiano, who's sinking under half a million dollars of debt at his restaurant in Great Neck, New York.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Jack's Waterfront: In Michigan, Gordon Ramsay visits a lakeside restaurant in a summer hotspot, where the food fails to match the fantastic views. Can Gordon turn the tide?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Proposal Proposal: Amy must decide whether or not to marry Sheldon and gives him an answer to his proposal. Howard and Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Retraction Reaction: Leonard angers the university during an embarrassing interview. Amy and Bernadette must hide their success from Sheldon and Howard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Relaxation Integration: Amy tries to convince Sheldon that he has a more laid-back side. Raj and Stuart compete to woo Bernadette's new colleague Ruchi.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Explosion Implosion: Howard and Sheldon bond on a trip to the desert to launch a model rocket. Leonard is annoyed when his mother befriends Penny.

programme.title: The Kid Who Would Be King
programme.desc: (2019) Fantasy adventure. A 12-year-old from modern-day suburbia finds King Arthur's sword Excalibur and must save the country from a sinister sorceress. With Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Take My Wife, Sleaze: Homer wins a motorbike and forms the Hell's Satans biker gang with Lenny, Carl, Moe and Flanders. But then they run into the original Hell's Satans...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Little Big Mom: When Marge breaks her leg in a skiing accident, Lisa takes over running the Simpson household, and Homer and Bart end up moving to a leper colony in Hawaii.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Skinner's Sense of Snow: When a huge snowdrift engulfs the school, Bart leads the kids in a rebellion, gagging Principal Skinner and tying him to a chair as they run amok.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homr: When Homer loses all the family's money with an unwise investment, he becomes a human guinea pig to earn some cash - and that's when he becomes extremely intelligent...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Pokey Mom: Marge notices a prison inmate's artistic talent and helps him to get a job painting a mural at the school. But he clashes with Skinner. Michael Keaton guest stars.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Worst Episode Ever: Bart and Milhouse end up running Comic Book Guy's shop after he has a heart attack. And, while he recovers, Comic Book Guy falls in love...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Tennis the Menace: Homer builds a tennis court in the back garden but becomes jealous of Bart's tennis skills and swears revenge at the Krusty Klassic tournament.

programme.title: The Great Christmas Bake Off
programme.desc: Sandi, Noel, Paul and Prue are joined by Liam and Flo from the 2017 Bake Off, and Jane and Andrew from 2016's show. Plus The Darkness perform Christmas Time (Don't Let the Bells End).

programme.title: Gogglebox Festive Special
programme.desc: The armchair critics take aim at Christmas TV, including Gavin and Stacey, Strictly Come Dancing, Home Alone, Dracula, and Jamie's Easy Christmas Countdown.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: This time on the 'Box: The Inheritance, You Bet! On Tour, KPopped, Emmerdale, The Guest, 90 Day Fianc UK, This Morning (roast dinner) and ITV News (Angela Rayner).

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: This time the Goggleboxers watch: The Inheritance, Long Lost Family, Unknown Number: The High School Catfish, The Yorkshire Vet, Dish It Out and Street Cops: Catching the Yobs.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Will James from Hertfordshire get the royal seal of approval from Kate Middleton lookalike Jodie? Abbie, who's a descendant of Henry VIII, meets former Chelsea bartender William.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: How will Adele react when Matt tells her his passion for Liverpool FC led to his divorce? Max and Esther bond over a shared love of words. Is Ben the nice guy Leora's looking for?

programme.title: Gogglebox Festive Special
programme.desc: The armchair critics take aim at Christmas TV, including Gavin and Stacey, Strictly Come Dancing, Home Alone, Dracula, and Jamie's Easy Christmas Countdown.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Thorpe Park: After passing his driving test, Simon takes the boys on their first road trip: a day out at Thorpe Park, where Will disgraces himself on the roller coaster.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Zayna Flaming Grill (Part 2/2): Gordon returns to California for the conclusion of his challenge to save Zayna Flaming Grill. Can he inject flavour into the tired menu?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Two-Timing Goldbergs: Love and loyalty win when Lainey comes home, and Adam and Carmen come to a crossroads in their relationship.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Theresa risks her own safety to help Mercedes. Darren extends an olive branch to Tony. Cleo gets some bittersweet news. A resident opens up about abuse. And Lucas spirals out of control...

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Hannah & Mason's: Gordon Ramsay's rescue mission this time is Hannah & Mason's, a French bistro in the quaint little town of Cranbury, New Jersey.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Zayna Flaming Grill (Part 2/2): Gordon returns to California for the conclusion of his challenge to save Zayna Flaming Grill. Can he inject flavour into the tired menu?

programme.title: Mog's Christmas
programme.desc: Family animation. The Thomas family's cat Mog is feeling ignored on Christmas Eve, so she decides to spend the night on the roof. With the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy.

programme.title: We're Going On a Bear Hunt
programme.desc: Wrap up warm and step into the snow for a wonderful animated adventure based on the bestselling bedtime book by Michael Rosen. Voiced by Olivia Colman, Pam Ferris and Mark Williams.

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Raymond Briggs's classic animated tale of a little boy's snowman who comes to life and whisks him off to the North Pole for an adventure.

programme.title: The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: Charming animated sequel to Raymond Briggs's classic The Snowman. When a young boy and his mother move house, he builds a snowman and a snowdog who magically come to life.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pilot: The first ever episode of the hit sitcom. Leonard and Sheldon's geeky world is shaken up by the arrival of a beautiful new neighbour.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Big Bran Hypothesis: Sheldon sneaks into Penny's flat to tidy it. She's not happy about it.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Collaboration Contamination: Sheldon and Raj ask Bernadette for advice about their jealousy when Amy and Howard decide to collaborate on a new project.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Proton Regeneration: Sheldon goes head-to-head with Wil Wheaton as they compete for the role of the new Professor Proton when the TV series has a reboot.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Geology Methodology: Sheldon and Bert collaborate on a research project, but Sheldon feels embarrassed to be associated with the study of geology.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tesla Recoil: Leonard and Howard learn that Sheldon went to work with the military behind their backs. Bernadette thinks Ruchi's trying to steal her job.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bitcoin Entanglement: Sheldon seeks revenge when the guys cut him out of a potentially valuable investment. A secret about Leonard and Penny is revealed.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Confidence Erosion: Sheldon and Amy try to use maths to make their wedding planning less stressful. Raj falls out with Howard.

programme.title: The Great New Year's Bake Off
programme.desc: Noel, Sandi, Prue and Paul are joined in the tent by former Bake Off stars Kate Henry, Dr Tamal, Candice and Steven, plus Britain's biggest boyband: The London Gay Men's Chorus.

programme.title: The Simpsons: Featuring Musicians
programme.desc: Homer's Barbershop Quartet: Guest starring George Harrison and David Crosby. Homer reminisces about the barbershop quartet he was in with Barney, Apu and Principal Skinner.

programme.title: The Simpsons: Featuring Musicians
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Springfields: Guest starring Roger Daltrey, Pete Townshend and John Entwistle of The Who. Homer becomes mayor of 'New Springfield'.

programme.title: The Simpsons: Featuring Musicians
programme.desc: Jazzy and the Pussycats: Guest starring Jack White and Meg White of The White Stripes. Bart takes up playing the drums, upstages Lisa and joins a top jazz band.

programme.title: The Simpsons: Featuring Musicians
programme.desc: Lisa Goes Gaga: Guest starring Lady Gaga. Lisa's plan to use online fake news to boost her popularity backfires.

programme.title: The Simpsons: Featuring Musicians
programme.desc: How I Spent My Strummer Vacation: Guest starring Mick Jagger, Keith Richards, Lenny Kravitz and Elvis Costello. Homer goes to a rock 'n' roll camp.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: (2021) Sci-fi action. Mark Wahlberg discovers that his hallucinations are memories from past lives. There are others like him, but they don't all have good intentions...

programme.title: Boston Strangler
programme.desc: (2023) Keira Knightley stars as Loretta McLaughlin, the reporter who fought 60s chauvinism to break the story of the notorious titular serial killer, in Matt Ruskin's true crime procedural.

programme.title: She Said
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based drama with Zoe Kazan and Carey Mulligan. New York Times journalists Jodi Kantor and Megan Twohey investigate the sexual abuses of Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein.

programme.title: French Exit
programme.desc: (2020) Comedy drama with Michelle Pfeiffer. A skint Manhattan socialite moves to Paris with her son and a cat... which may or may not contain the spirit of her dead husband.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: (1952) Drama starring Ralph Richardson as a pioneering aviator determined to break the sound barrier, even if it means risking the lives of those closest to him. Directed by David Lean.

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: (1958) Drama. Jack Hawkins stars as Police Inspector Gideon, who faces outrage and danger in his quest to bring London's criminals to justice. With Anna Massey, John Loder and Cyril Cusack.

programme.title: Animal Farm
programme.desc: (1954) George Orwell's cautionary tale reimagined in cartoon form. A farm's animals revolt against their abusive owner only for the pigs to become drunk with their newly found power.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: (1955) Atmospheric Victorian melodrama. Stewart Granger plays a sinister aristocrat who poisons his wife. However, his maid (Jean Simmons) knows his secret and tries to use it against him.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: (1994) Oscar-winning turn-of-the-century drama with Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins. A Montana patriarch's son falls for his brother's fiance, setting off a tragic chain of events.

programme.title: American Gangster Special
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe and director Ridley Scott talk about making American Gangster, the 2007 crime epic based on an unlikely true story.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: (2011) Thriller with Jason Statham and Donald Sutherland. A hitman is ordered to kill his mentor, but then takes on the dead man's son as an apprentice. Could get complicated... and deadly.

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: (2020) Hushed-horror sequel with Emily Blunt and Cillian Murphy. Armed only with a hearing aid, can the family evade the vicious aliens with super-hearing, and find a community to live in?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: (2019) Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jennifer Garner, Mila Kunis, John Oliver and Matthew Broderick. A girl's imaginary theme park comes to life when her mum goes to hospital.

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: (2019) Animated spy comedy caper with the voice of Will Smith. The 'world's most awesome spy' gets framed and has to go undercover as a pigeon to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: (1951) Drama. James Mason stars in Henry Hathaway's sympathetic portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel in the final years of his life during the Second World War. With Jessica Tandy.

programme.title: The Perfect Catch
programme.desc: (2005) Comedy. Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his two loves: Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the Boston Red Sox baseball team. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: (2004) Tense sci-fi thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid. A scientist sets out to save his son when global warming plunges the world into a sudden climatic catastrophe.

programme.title: The King's Man
programme.desc: (2021) The spy-caper franchise continues with the origins story of the Kingsman agency, as a plucky group battle an international conspiracy at the outbreak of WWI. With Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: (2022) Meta-comedy horror 're-quel' with Courteney Cox. Killer Ghostface returns to shock the younger generation out of their love of 'elevated horror' with a bit of old-fashioned slashing.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: (1945) Five uncanny tales of the supernatural in one eerie package, the most famous starring ventriloquist Michael Redgrave and a deadly dummy. Prepare to be spooked.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: (1972) Historical drama with Keith Michell as Henry VIII, nobly supported by Donald Pleasance, Charlotte Rampling and Jane Asher. The dying monarch reviews his own life.

programme.title: Oblivion Interview Special
programme.desc: Tom Cruise talks about making the sci-fi-adventure Oblivion.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: (1983) Comedy starring Peter Riegert, Burt Lancaster and Peter Capaldi. A US oil company executive tries to persuade a small Scottish seaside community to sell up their entire village.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Henry Cavill, Simon Pegg, Vanessa Kirby and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about making the sixth instalment in the thriller series.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: (2019) Roland Emmerich's sprawling, action-packed war drama about the Battle of Midway, a major turning point in World War II. Starring Ed Skrein, Luke Evans and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: (2013) Sci-fi action-mystery set on a war-ravaged planet Earth that's been largely abandoned by humanity. With Tom Cruise, Andrea Riseborough, Olga Kurylenko and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Good Luck to You, Leo Grande
programme.desc: (2022) Drama starring Emma Thompson as a recently widowed, retired teacher who has a sexual bucket list she wants to get around to now that she has the time and, perhaps, even the energy.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: (2018) Nautical action thriller. Gerard Butler stars as an unconventional submarine skipper sent to investigate the torpedoing of a US vessel. With Gary Oldman, Linda Cardellini and Common.

programme.title: Patrick Christys Tonight
programme.desc: Join Patrick for two hours of spirited debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the issues that matter, with a sharp take on every story.

programme.title: Patrick Christys Tonight Late Edition
programme.desc: Tomorrow's news, tonight. All the major stories making the front pages and full coverage of all the breaking news at home and abroad with Patrick Christys.

programme.title: The Late Show Live
programme.desc: Live from Washington DC, Bev Turner and Ben Leo bring you the latest from the US and what it means for Britain.

programme.title: Farage
programme.desc: Nigel Farage doesn't hold back in his GB News prime-time show. Hear his views and give your own in an hour of discussion and debate. Join Nigel as he takes on the big stories other media won't touch.

programme.title: Patrick Christys Tonight
programme.desc: Join Patrick for two hours of spirited debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the issues that matter, with a sharp take on every story.

programme.title: Patrick Christys Tonight Late...
programme.desc: Edition. Tomorrow's news, tonight. All the major stories making the front pages and full coverage of all the breaking news at home and abroad with Patrick Christys.

programme.title: Breakfast with Stephen and Ellie
programme.desc: Join Stephen Dixon and Ellie Costello to start your day across the United Kingdom. This is your breakfast show. Join the conversation about what is happening in our nation and the world.

programme.title: Britain's Newsroom
programme.desc: Miriam and Alex present every Friday morning. When the news happens, it happens here. But what does it mean for you? GB News brings you the biggest stories and the answers you need from across the UK.

programme.title: Good Afternoon Britain
programme.desc: Tackling the big stories from all angles and perspectives. Weekdays from midday, Tom Harwood and Dawn Neesom bring you the most compelling stories from across the United Kingdom.

programme.title: Martin Daubney
programme.desc: Join Martin for an up-to-the-minute take on the day's events delivered in his own unique and lively style.

programme.title: Dewbs & Co
programme.desc: Plain-speaking, straight-talking - Michelle delivers her individual take on the day's news.

programme.title: Lee Anderson's Real World
programme.desc: Lee Anderson brings the Real World to the Great British public, as the silent majority finally have their voices heard.

programme.title: Friday Night with Matt Goodwin
programme.desc: Britain was once the envy of the world. Join Matt Goodwin as he explores how we fix the problems facing the country.
